# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

# Target: raknet
set(raknet_SOURCES
	"src/main.cpp"
	"include/hooks.hpp"
	"include/patterns.hpp"
	"include/requests.hpp"
	"include/scanner.hpp"
	"include/stream.hpp"
	"include/structs.hpp"
	cmake.toml
)

add_library(raknet SHARED)

target_sources(raknet PRIVATE ${raknet_SOURCES})
source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${raknet_SOURCES})

target_compile_features(raknet PUBLIC
	cxx_std_20
)

target_include_directories(raknet PUBLIC
	include
	"kthook/include"
)

target_link_libraries(raknet PUBLIC
	kthook
)
